channel.title: Runescape riots in years 2007 - 2012
channel.description:
2007 is when rs went all down hill.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ieZbcd0Et5o

item.title: Runescape riots in years 2007 - 2012
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

bibbobbib:

Lol at the last one they are breaking their own rule, isn’t paying for membership real world item trading? At the end of the day jagex is a company, they don’t give a shit what the players say. They will only care if thousands of you quit at the same time, then they will be losing money

Rules do not apply to Jagex, read there policies. Essentionally in there tos or w.e. its called they can do what they want.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape riots in years 2007 - 2012
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I remember the riot in 2007. I didn’t go though.

A friend pmed me said go to world whatever there’s a riot. Of course at my age I had no idea what a riot was so I didn’t go because I was scared or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape riots in years 2007 - 2012
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Bottled Water:

>game went downhill after Andrew sold Jagex

Hate to admit it, but its true.

Acorn_:

I’ve come to like the 10x updates.

Samers, hated them then realised it doesn’t matter and it works out better for lower levels who can’t hit too high.

item.title: Runescape riots in years 2007 - 2012
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

That was pretty funny to watch. I’ve only heard of a few of them though. I was playing when the free trade/wild update happened. To see people get this mad over pixels is just sad. And yes… a lot of people quit. Which is why RS still has 100k+ players.

marcbob:

Watched some of the video and it seems whoever made it was just pulling stuff out of their ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape riots in years 2007 - 2012
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

i was at the pk riot when i was only about lvl40 even tho i didnt realise anything going wrong in the actual game at the time my irl was going madd
the only update I hated at that time was the bar going from small rectangle to big rectangle and games like this should be classical and kept classical and later then x10 hits were made and i was just wondering what the hell the point was too it surely jagex knew thered be more haters than people that actually liked the update

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape riots in years 2007 - 2012
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:31, topic:439224”]I really think the players of RS are babies. All they did was change HP to LP and x10 it, and yet they made a riot for it. That’s really sad.[/quote]Also changed the great emote into something so shitty and pointless.

Read full topic

And i prob saw you there, what was ur username at the time?[/quote]
